titles.title: International Insurance Capital Standards Accountability Act of 2017
International Insurance Capital Standards Accountability Act of 2017

A bill to require the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System to establish an Insurance Policy Advisory Committee on International Capital Standards and Other Insurance Issues, and for other purposes.
International Insurance Capital Standards Accountability Act of 2017

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
